item.title: 5 years at Microsoft, my lucky story!
item.description: 1Automatic translated from Portuguese. I'll fix it and review as soon as possible. This week on Sep 1, 2019, it’s been 5 years that I am lucky to work in the biggest IT company in the world. The dream company in which I finally joined at 25 years old. Luck doesn’t come from 5 years back. That luck started in 2004 – 15 years ago when I was 15 years old.
